post.body: poppa get shit done.
you know what? thats really good to hear. he one of the good ones.
yall better not say nothin bout cease. thats my fam.
word, i didnt appreciate what they made charli look like up in that video. tv theme beats are slammin though.
poppa dont sweat haters. silky and master pee can do they thing, aint like they gonna do what juicy did.
jump on what? the mtume joint?
fuck all that bullshit. aint nobody tryna listen to no mtume shit until poppa spit a verse. they need to thank me.
i aint mad at nasir. homie got mixed up in that firm bullshit but his flow nice.
i aint got nothin to say about that shit.
word.
speakin of lacing shit, when you sleepin? you on twitter all hours. you run into winehouse over in europe or what?
word, thats the truth right there.
we all gonna laugh about it in 10 years, like how we clownin on all them "funky president" samples in the '90s.
word, thats nice.
SMH
see @PacIsAlive
maybe yall could bust a rhyme bout some of them fanny packs. and zubaz (no disrespect to @mchammer).
on the real, yall the whitest motherfucker on twitter.
homie, yall got some trouble?
thats true.
word. yall a homie or honey? seen your picture but i dont think you a real dog in a can. or maybe. what do Poppa know.
i aint comin to no motherfuckin wang house. yall got your own business, no disrespect. But Poppa do not get down like that.
yo, gonna do the usual, have faye over with my momma, cj, t'yanna. gonna eat mad food, maybe sex some big booty bitches after.
ok, ok. we cool, just keep ya shit straight.
word, look like yall cant even afford no shirt. ima send over some coogi shit. check your mail, homie.
yall threatening me, motherfucker?
word, poppa sound nice. but shit, my time aint worth all that mess.
what? Poppa just crackin the first MoÃ«t, homie.
look like yall could use an 808 and some big booty bitches up in there.
word, just spittin a rhyme over here.
yall need help. SMH.
yo, Poppa can fix that.
yo, i like how you think.
thats better, homie. we cool.
ps dont NEVER say nothin bout Poppa's extra whip again. yall feelin me?
now you talkin straight crazy shit. thats some angel dust talk right there.
girl, i got a feelin we might have some other shit in common. hit me on my pager, so poppa can get up in them draws.
word. thats just real talk right there.
yo, that shits mad disturbing, why you gotta get grimy? nah, Poppa just playin. good lookin out!
the fuck is a quaff. Poppa dont want no part of that shit.
oh word. that some funny shit.
yo, i like your style, baby. i believe yall should be havin my baby.
Yes Love, love your fucking attitude because the nigga play pussy that's the nigga that's getting screwed.
nah, no need for that, just grab the fuckin gat.
what? yall French or some shit?
fuck all that bullshit.
nah, Poppa relaxed enough, son.
word.
yall better make sure faye aint readin that. honey gettin violent on that shit.
i know yall aint talkin bout my wife like that.
yo, thats straight up.
i usually call up kim and have her shovel my damn driveway. why?
word, what you need, homie?
thats mad fucked up. yall need me to tell somebody whats what?
oh shit! where you get that Rude Boy button? thats fresh as hell, homie.
fuck all that bullshit. you know, Poppa got feelings too.
"keep ya feet on the ground, and keep reachin for the stars." -casey casem.
the what? see, this is what i'm talkin about. yall get some of that method man dutch this morning?
oh word, with the lotions and oils. if yall ever need help, hit me on my pager.
thats what i like about you, homie. you a generous motherfucker.
mornin baby. how your booty look today?
yo, homie. its been a minute.
damn, homie. yall high as hell. redman get to you too?
Cran-what?! now you just tryna make Biggie mad.
yo, stolen notes? im thinkin it was that short motherfucker from around the corner. yall need Poppa to tell him whats what?
65 in brooklyn, homie.
yo, @qoolquest. me and @isanaka wanna know where d'angelo at. where you hidin homie?
fuck it, too tired. sexed too many of these big booty bitches today, poppa need balance in his life.
had a fatass steak for dinner, fucked up a snitch, blazed a little dutch. bored as shit tonight. guess ill call puffy.
avoiding ma$e's calls
ran into teddy riley on the way back from the barber shop. beard still look the same, new hat.
oh shit @qoolquest dont panic! i meant buff love. my bad.
im starvin, i'm in the mood. plain and simple, i need food. RIP prince markie dee, but on the real, Poppa HONGRY.
none of this oj shit woulda happened with johnny cochran runnin shit.
lost my cane last night. i think that cassie tryna be funny. she fine, but she aint funny.
oh shit, that sound kinda wack. didnt come out right.
bout to kill this cheese danish and this butterhorn. yall can clown on my man, but puffy got nice pastry.
shit is mad fucked up: http://www.nytimes.com/2008/12/10/nyregion/10officers.html
bout to call redman, he always got the live shit goin on.
puffy tryin to get me to sing some karaoke bullshit again. fuck that, Poppa cant handle bitchasses talkin bout "she just a friend."
puffy trippin if he think Poppa gonna get his black ass outta bed for a gotdamn conference call. fuck clive davis.
ungh!
unfollowing @KingCole1. cant understand one motherfuckin word he say. try english, homie.
yo, fuck humidity. Poppa sweatin like Keith up in this bitch.
found Redman in electronics, tellin the clerk some shit about existentialism and slick rick's gold teeth. shit, can we bounce already?
damn, i think @markpimentel might be right. gonna kill this pumpkin bread then i better go get Red out the damn Target.
waitin for redman at starbucks. bout to body this venti peppermint mocha with extra motherfuckin whip.
think i had too much remy up in faye's crib. damn, when this sweater get so motherfuckin hot?
yo, R.I.P. Bettie Page. that bitch was like tadow, on the real.
slept in, headin over to bad boy in a minute. cant find my damn shoes again, faye musta put em somewhere.
damn, how long I been asleep? fuck Applebees riblets, knock Poppa the fuck out.
gettin tired of these big booty hoes comin to Poppa's breakfast table in a thong. tryna eat my damn eggs. aint nobody got manners anymore?
rt @effedparkslope: U must check out our hilarious interview with @NotoriousBIG...if u don't know, now u know: http://tinyurl.com/59mm23
yall would not believe the @replies Biggie get sometimes. crazy cheech & chong shit.
damn, i cant believe how many of yall high as hell. talkin crazy shit that cant nobody understand but you and that bag of fritos you mackin.
